channel.title: Need help with ::rules(hopefully lothy)
channel.description: i made it so that you had to type ::rules before moving. one problem, you can't move >< after you type ::rules you still can't move log out then in, can't move can som1 help me plx ><

item.title: Need help with ::rules(hopefully lothy)
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

change that code to

public void rules();
   {            sendQuest("@bla@Rules", 8144); //Title
               clearQuestInterface();
               sendQuest("@bla@Register at www.gamingbums.com", 8145);
               sendQuest("@bla@Or I will IP ban you", 8146);
               sendQuestSomething(8143);
               showInterface(8134);
               flushOutStream();
               }

then add this command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) {
    readRules = true;
    rules();
}

Where do you add the command?

find “rules” if you have it replace the command with the one given if not look for “help” then add it under that!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::rules(hopefully lothy)

@Taylor_John0 wrote:

illegal start of type

item.title: Need help with ::rules(hopefully lothy)
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

I know how to use code tags, but I only posted the code, the tags are to keep organized… If you insist:

public void RulesMenu()
	{				sendQuest("@dbl@Rules", 8144); //Title
					clearQuestInterface();
					sendQuest("@cya@Order", 8145);
					sendQuest("Warn", 8146);
					sendQuest("Kick", 8147);
					sendQuest("Kick", 8148);
					sendQuest("Two Day Mute", 8149);
					sendQuest("No Admin/Mod-Ship", 8150);
					sendQuest("Two Day Ban", 8151);
					sendQuest("One Week Ban", 8152);
					sendQuest("Permanent Ban", 8153);
					sendQuest("If you continue to distrupt players on a different", 8154);
					sendQuest("account, you will get an IP Ban and a Hamach Ban.", 8155);
					sendQuest("@whi@ RULES", 8156);
					sendQuest("Do Not Summon And Attack Other Players", 8157);
					sendQuest("Do Not Abuse Kick Or Ban", 8158);
					sendQuest("Don't noclip alot. A few times is fine", 8159);
					sendQuest("Don't PK in white armor", 8160);
					sendQuest("Do not PK with a 'perfect' ring", 8161);
					sendQuest("@gre@Have Fun!", 8162);
					sendQuest("There are not many rules, don't break them", 8163);
					sendQuest("@whi@Rules don't apply to owner user name", 8164);
					sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();
					}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::rules(hopefully lothy)
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

public void rules()
{ sendQuest("@dbl@Rules", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@cya@Order", 8145);
sendQuest(“Warn”, 8146);
sendQuest(“Kick”, 8147);
sendQuest(“Kick”, 8148);
sendQuest(“Two Day Mute”, 8149);
sendQuest(“No Admin/Mod-Ship”, 8150);
sendQuest(“Two Day Ban”, 8151);
sendQuest(“One Week Ban”, 8152);
sendQuest(“Permanent Ban”, 8153);
sendQuest(“If you continue to distrupt players on a different”, 8154);
sendQuest(“account, you will get an IP Ban and a Hamach Ban.”, 8155);
sendQuest("@whi@ RULES", 8156);
sendQuest(“Do Not Summon And Attack Other Players”, 8157);
sendQuest(“Do Not Abuse Kick Or Ban”, 8158);
sendQuest(“Don’t noclip alot. A few times is fine”, 8159);
sendQuest(“Don’t PK in white armor”, 8160);
sendQuest(“Do not PK with a ‘perfect’ ring”, 8161);
sendQuest("@gre@Have Fun!", 8162);
sendQuest(“There are not many rules, don’t break them”, 8163);
sendQuest("@whi@Rules don’t apply to owner user name", 8164);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::rules(hopefully lothy)
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Mine:

public void RulesMenu()
{ sendQuest("@dbl@Rules", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@cya@Order", 8145);
sendQuest(“Warn”, 8146);
sendQuest(“Kick”, 8147);
sendQuest(“Kick”, 8148);
sendQuest(“Two Day Mute”, 8149);
sendQuest(“No Admin/Mod-Ship”, 8150);
sendQuest(“Two Day Ban”, 8151);
sendQuest(“One Week Ban”, 8152);
sendQuest(“Permanent Ban”, 8153);
sendQuest(“If you continue to distrupt players on a different”, 8154);
sendQuest(“account, you will get an IP Ban and a Hamach Ban.”, 8155);
sendQuest("@whi@ RULES", 8156);
sendQuest(“Do Not Summon And Attack Other Players”, 8157);
sendQuest(“Do Not Abuse Kick Or Ban”, 8158);
sendQuest(“Don’t noclip alot. A few times is fine”, 8159);
sendQuest(“Don’t PK in white armor”, 8160);
sendQuest(“Do not PK with a ‘perfect’ ring”, 8161);
sendQuest("@gre@Have Fun!", 8162);
sendQuest(“There are not many rules, don’t break them”, 8163);
sendQuest("@whi@Rules don’t apply to owner user name", 8164);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
